It turns out to be life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez.(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teenager living in a peaceful community is sent to assist the old man who is the keeper of the settlement's history. The assignment leads him to uncover the dark secrets behind his idyllic surroundings, and he realises he must find a way to escape. Sci-fi adventure based on Lois Lowry's novel, starring Jeff Bridges, Brenton Thwaites and Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice.(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: Three students break into a house mistakenly thinking it belongs to their friend, and end up accidentally killing the groundskeeper who catches them trespassing. They try to come up with an elaborate lie to cover up their crime, but their consiences begin to trouble them, with deadly consequences. Thriller, starring Helen Rogers, Alexandra Turshen and Lauren Molina.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: A hitman is hired by two notorious gangster brothers to murder a politician. He falls for a woman during the assignment, but does not realise she is his victim's daughter. Her investigation of her father's death threatens to cause a gang war and puts the assassin at odds with his employers. Crime thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Gary and Martin Kemp.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two teenagers murder a random victim for their own amusement, convinced nobody will ever suspect them of committing such a senseless crime, and ensure all the evidence points to a drug dealer. However, they reckon without a suspicious and determined detective and her partner. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock, Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt.

programme.title: Supremacy
programme.desc: A white supremacist kills a policeman on his first day after being released from jail, jeopardising the task he has been given by an imprisoned gang leader. He and his girlfriend try to avoid being recaptured by taking a family hostage, and are drawn into a battle of wills with the father, who is also an ex-convict. Crime drama, starring Joe Anderson and Danny Glover.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: A hitman is hired by two notorious gangster brothers to murder a politician. He falls for a woman during the assignment, but does not realise she is his victim's daughter. Her investigation of her father's death threatens to cause a gang war and puts the assassin at odds with his employers. Crime thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Gary and Martin Kemp.

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: A woman offers help to a stranger who turns up on her doorstep, claiming his car has broken down and asking to use her phone. He soon reveals his true identity as a dangerous ex-convict, and she and her family face a battle for survival when they are held hostage in their own home. Thriller, starring Idris Elba and Taraji P Henson.

programme.title: Pride and Glory
programme.desc: A family of police officers is thrown into turmoil when semi-retired brother Ray is charged with investigating the deaths of four officers during an ambush at a drug dealer's apartment. When his findings reveal evidence of departmental corruption, Ray finds himself divided between personal loyalties and duty to his badge. Thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Edward Norton, Jon Voight and Noah Emmerich.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Uncompromising detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan hunts the ringleaders behind a bizarre death lottery which is seemingly being used to murder well-known figures. The case becomes personal when he discovers his own name is on the list of prospective victims. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Patricia Clarkson, Liam Neeson and an early appearance by Jim Carrey.

programme.title: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A devoted husband is left at home alone when his family is away for the weekend. When two stranded women turn up on his doorstep, he invites them in and is tempted to take advantage of the opportunity - only to find himself drawn into a seductive and dangerous game of cat and mouse. Thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo and Ana de Armas.

programme.title: Return to Sender
programme.desc: A small-town nurse goes on a blind date with a stranger who rapes her. As she struggles to rebuild her life, she takes to regularly visiting her attacker in prison. However, when he is released, he discovers she has been planning her revenge. Thriller, starring Rosamund Pike, Shiloh Fernandez and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Final Analysis
programme.desc: A psychiatrist treats a woman who is repressing traumatic memories. He meets his patient's sister in the hope of learning more about their troubled childhood, but they end up having an affair. The shrink later learns his lover is married to a psychopathic gangster, and is drawn into a murderous plot. Thriller, starring Kim Basinger, Richard Gere, Uma Thurman and Eric Roberts.(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two 10-year-old boys find a seemingly abandoned police car in a glade and decide to take it for a joyride. However, the obsessive local sheriff is prepared to go to any lengths to get the vehicle back, and the youngsters find themselves drawn into a deadly game of cat and mouse. Crime thriller, starring Kevin Bacon and Camryn Manheim.(n)

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: Terrorists armed with the world's most lethal nerve gas take over an airliner and demand a massive ransom - and only a crack team of intelligence experts can stop them before they carry out their threat to destroy Washington, DC. Action thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Steven Seagal, Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, David Suchet and John Leguizamo.(n)

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Federal marshal Pete Nessip escorts a convicted computer hacker to a new facility. Events soon spiral out of control and the convict escapes, killing Pete's brother on the way. The tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture the fugitive and avenge his sibling's death. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Gary Busey, Yancy Butler and Michael Jeter.(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: An imprisoned art thief and forger learns that his son is dying, and applies for early release. While his request is granted, he learns that the shady characters who granted his freedom want him to assist them in a daring heist, leaving him torn between carrying out the robbery and making his son's last wishes come true. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Plummer.(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.(n)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two 10-year-old boys find a seemingly abandoned police car in a glade and decide to take it for a joyride. However, the obsessive local sheriff is prepared to go to any lengths to get the vehicle back, and the youngsters find themselves drawn into a deadly game of cat and mouse. Crime thriller, starring Kevin Bacon and Camryn Manheim.(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: GoodFellas
programme.desc: An Irish-Italian boy from a poor neighbourhood grows up idolising the glamorous lifestyle of the Mafia. Taken under the wing of a mobster, he rises quickly in the world of organised crime. But he soon has to face the realities of murder and treachery, while his involvement in drug deals puts him at risk from both sides of the law. Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Robert De Niro and an Oscar-winning Joe Pesci.(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Detectives hunt a killer who kidnaps his victims and forces them to play sadistic games with life-or-death consequences. Meanwhile, two strangers wake to find themselves chained to pipes in a filthy, derelict bathroom - and at the mercy of the madman, who sets them a twisted challenge. Horror, written by and starring Leigh Whannell, alongside Cary Elwes, Danny Glover and Dina Meyer.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The sinister criminal Jigsaw is preparing to mete out his deranged and sadistic form of justice on more hapless victims. Meanwhile, a cop is desperately searching for the madman and the gruesome prison where he is holding eight terrified strangers. Horror sequel, starring Tobin Bell, Donnie Wahlberg, Shawnee Smith and Franky G.

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: Former alien abductees fight fellow victims of extraterrestrial attacks who have been brainwashed into taking over the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Christopher Meloni, Marcia Cross and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: Stage Fright
programme.desc: A hopeful young singer is terrorised by a masked killer at a performing-arts camp. Horror musical, starring Allie MacDonald, Meat Loaf Aday and Minnie Driver.

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young hero's quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Edne's novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes.

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Scientists create a clone of Ripley to get hold of the alien queen growing inside her body and breed a new race of the monsters. However, when the creatures escape and turn on their makers, the new Ripley must lead a smuggling crew caught up in the mayhem to safety. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young hero's quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Edne's novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes.

programme.title: Stage Fright
programme.desc: A hopeful young singer is terrorised by a masked killer at a performing-arts camp. Horror musical, starring Allie MacDonald, Meat Loaf Aday and Minnie Driver.(n)

programme.desc: Scientists create a clone of Ripley to get hold of the alien queen growing inside her body and breed a new race of the monsters. However, when the creatures escape and turn on their makers, the new Ripley must lead a smuggling crew caught up in the mayhem to safety. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: A small California town is infiltrated by sinister alien vegetable pods from outer space, which start to clone the residents and replace them with emotionless replicas. A local doctor realises something bizarre is going on and sets out to investigate - but is not prepared for what he finds. Don Siegel's sci-fi thriller, with Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter and Carolyn Jones.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighbouring woods. Horror, starring Kevin Durand, Lukas Haas and Steve Agee.(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A wealthy old man dying of cancer arranges to have his consciousness transplanted into a younger body. The procedure is a success, but he begins to have suspicions about where his new body came from - only to find that the company behind the process will kill to protect their dark secrets. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad: Special
programme.desc: The making of the DC movie about a group of super-villains thrown together on a mission to save the world, including behind-the-scenes footage and cast interviews.(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brody's two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton.(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong.(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A wealthy old man dying of cancer arranges to have his consciousness transplanted into a younger body. The procedure is a success, but he begins to have suspicions about where his new body came from - only to find that the company behind the process will kill to protect their dark secrets. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad: Special
programme.desc: The making of the DC movie about a group of super-villains thrown together on a mission to save the world, including behind-the-scenes footage and cast interviews.(n)

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: At the height of the Cold War, former superheroes driven into retirement by public outcry are confronted with the murder of one of their number. As they face the possibility of a conspiracy to eliminate them, they must contend with a world edging closer to the brink of nuclear war. Sci-fi drama, based on Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons' graphic novel, starring Patrick Wilson, Jackie Earle Haley, Malin Akerman and Billy Crudup.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.(n)

programme.title: The Devils
programme.desc: A sexually liberated priest in 17th-century France attracts the hatred of the King and the church with his radical views. When an obsessed nun accuses him of witchcraft, the cleric's enemies strike, using increasingly brutal tactics in their efforts to prove him a heretic. Ken Russell's historical drama, starring Oliver Reed and Vanessa Redgrave.

programme.title: Who's That Knocking at My Door
programme.desc: Harvey Keitel plays a tough Italian-American who prefers hanging out with a rough and ready street gang to spending time with his increasingly frustrated girlfriend. Urban crime story, with Zina Bethune and Anne Colette.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: The Necessary Death of Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: A troubled American travels to Romania in the aftermath of his mother's death. He becomes obsessed with a cellist he meets who is concealing a violent past. His efforts to romance her could cost him his life following a run-in with her brutally violent husband. Drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Evan Rachel Wood and Mads Mikkelsen.

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: The Sea Inside
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a fisherman who is paralysed from the neck down in a diving accident. After spending years dependent on others to take care of him, he decides to fight for the legal right to end his own life. Starring Javier Bardem, Belen Rueda and Lola Duenas. In Spanish, Catalan and Galician.

programme.title: The Guns of Navarone
programme.desc: An elite group of Allied soldiers is dispatched to sabotage vital German artillery emplacements, despite the seemingly insurmountable odds and the suspicion there is a traitor in their midst. Oscar-winning Second World War adventure, based on Alistair MacLean's novel, starring Gregory Peck, David Niven, Anthony Quinn, Stanley Baker, Anthony Quayle and Irene Papas.

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Boxer Rubin `Hurricane' Carter dreams of winning the middleweight world title, only to be wrongfully thrown into prison for the murders of three people in a bar. Nineteen years later, a teenager reads the fighter's autobiography and sets out on a campaign to free him. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, John Hannah, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber and Dan Hedaya.

programme.title: Birdman: Or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)
programme.desc: A faded movie star famous for his role in a series of superhero movies 20 years previously tries to reclaim his artisitic integrity by directing and starring in a Broadway play. The experience plunges him into a personal crisis as both the production and his own family are beset by a series of disasters. Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Keaton, Edward Norton and Emma Stone.

programme.title: Full Metal Jacket
programme.desc: Raw recruits undergo harsh training under a domineering Marine drill sergeant after being called up for service in the Vietnam War, but his brutal methods lead to the breakdown of one of his cadets. Eventually, some of the fully trained soldiers get their first taste of combat in 1968. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio and R Lee Ermey.

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: A suburban family man has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with a friend of his teenage daughter. Struggling to cope with the unhealthy attention her father is lavishing on her friend, the girl begins a tentative relationship of her own, while her harassed mother is also having an affair. Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley.

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: An Elvis-obsessed ex-con and his lover set off on a nightmarish journey across America pursued by a variety of bizarre and deadly characters. David Lynch's dark road movie, starring Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Diane Ladd, Willem Dafoe, Harry Dean Stanton and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: A detective is sent to Alaska to investigate a murder during a month when the sun does not set. Sleep deprivation starts to take its toll, and he accidentally shoots his partner dead. He tries to cover it up, but the criminal they were hunting has seen everything and blackmails the cop into helping him escape justice. Thriller directed by Christopher Nolan, starring Al Pacino, Robin Williams and Hilary Swank.(n)

programme.title: The Sea Inside
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a fisherman who is paralysed from the neck down in a diving accident. After spending years dependent on others to take care of him, he decides to fight for the legal right to end his own life. Starring Javier Bardem, Belen Rueda and Lola Duenas. In Spanish, Catalan and Galician.(n)

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.(n)

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.(n)

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic.(n)

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious soldier defies orders to lead two men on a secret attack on a German pillbox, but his mission fails and the other two soldiers are killed. Court-martialled for his actions, he remains convinced his plan was sound and ignores the sentence to make a second attempt at destroying the emplacement. Second World War adventure, with Steve McQueen, James Coburn and Bobby Darin.(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Two middle-aged men embark on a wine-tasting tour in California a week before one of them is due to be married. The groom-to-be is determined to persuade his self-hating, embittered friend to loosen up - while also making it clear he intends to cheat on his fiancee before the week is out. Comedy, starring Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen and Sandra Oh.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: In the future, Earth has been devastated by an environmental catastrophe and will soon become incapable of supporting human life. A former astronaut is recruited to carry out a desperate mission - piloting the last remaining spacecraft through a wormhole in search of another planet that can become humanity's new home. Sci-fi drama, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Michael Caine.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.(n)

programme.title: The Girl Who Played with Fire
programme.desc: Troubled computer hacker Lisbeth is framed for three murders and forced to flee for her life. As her journalist friend Mikael searches for evidence of her innocence, he discovers connections with a sex-trafficking ring, government corruption and Lisbeth's own traumatic past. Thriller sequel to The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, starring Noomi Rapace and Michael Nyqvist. In Swedish, Italian and French.

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: Withdrawn, mute 10-year-old Philip is ignored by his parents and goes off to explore Dartmoor alone, where he meets a retired colonel who shares his knowledge of Devon's wildlife. Under the older man's nurturing tutelage, the boy begins to tame a wild white colt, but fate proffers a series of setbacks just as real progress is being made. Children's drama, starring John Mills, Mark Lester, Sylvia Syms and Bernard Miles.

programme.title: A Monster in Paris
programme.desc: A would-be inventor accidentally creates a monster which escapes onto the streets of Paris. As the scientist and his sidekick try to find their creation before the police do, the creature befriends a kindly cabaret singer, who discovers he has a gentle nature and a gift for music. Animated comedy, with the voices of Vanessa Paradis and Sean Lennon.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Cellmates Fletcher and Godber are coerced into aiding an escape attempt organised by the sinister Grouty. However, the two jailbirds contrive to break back into prison before their absence is detected by the formidable Mr Mackay. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale, Peter Vaughan, Fulton Mackay and Brian Wilde.

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: A couple whose daughter develops leukaemia have another child to eventually provide a donor organ for her sister. However, as the younger child enters her teens and learns why she was born, she rejects the arrangement and hires a lawyer to seek legal separation from her parents. Drama, starring Cameron Diaz, Abigail Breslin and Alec Baldwin.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends travel to a remote woodland cabin, hoping one of them can conquer her drug addiction by going cold turkey. They uncover a mysterious book that, when read, unleashes demonic forces that possess the living and transform them into bloodthirsty zombies. Horror remake, starring Jane Levy and Shiloh Fernandez.

programme.title: Nosferatu the Vampyre
programme.desc: A recently married man is held prisoner in the castle of a vampire. He manages to escape, but returns home a broken man with no memory. However, the vampire follows him, spreading plague in his wake, and is filled with obsession for his victim's wife. Werner Herzog's horror, a remake of the silent film inspired by Bram Stoker's Dracula, with Klaus Kinski, Isabelle Adjani, Bruno Ganz and Walter Ladengast. In German, English and Romany.(n)

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson.(n)

programme.title: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya
programme.desc: An elderly bamboo cutter finds a tiny princess hidden in a tree, little realising she will grow up to be a beautiful, strong-willed woman. After receiving several marriage proposals, she sets her suitors a variety of challenges in an attempt to learn which of them deserves to win her heart. Animated fantasy, featuring the voice of Chloe Grace Moretz, James Caan and Mary Steenburgen.(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Musical remake of the comedy about Tracy, an overweight teenager in 1960s Baltimore, who dreams of appearing on a TV dance show. However, a jealous rival and her scheming mother are determined to destroy her ambition - especially when Tracy tries to fight racism in the community. Starring Nikki Blonsky, Michelle Pfeiffer, Christopher Walken, James Marsden, Queen Latifah and John Travolta in drag as the heroine's mother.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.(n)

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: Two young girls go missing in Pennsylvania over the Thanksgiving holidays, and suspicion initially falls on Alex Jones, a young man with apparent learning difficulties, who was spotted near the children's last known location. When no evidence of wrongdoing is found, Jones is freed from custody, but the distraught father of one of the missing youngsters is not convinced of Jones' innocence, and kidnaps him in the hope of extracting a confession by force. Thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal and Paul Dano.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John cannot find his high school diploma, so is forced to take a test to prove to the army that he graduated. Mary Ellen takes over from the county nurse.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia campaigns for setting up a nursery for the children of defence plant workers, while the Godseys' anniversary celebrations are ruined by jealousy.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Walnut Grove celebrates the centennial of the United States, but the party is threatened with cancellation when taxes go up - while a Russian immigrant faces losing his home.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Whipple's son returns home after fighting in the Civil War, but the trauma of the conflict has left him with an addiction to morphine.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Secrets
programme.desc: The cast of a glossy American TV series' steamy on-screen relationships pale in comparison with their behind-the-scenes antics. Drama, starring Stephanie Beacham, Christopher Plummer, Linda Purl, Gary Collins and Ben Browder.

programme.title: A War of Children
programme.desc: A Catholic girl angers her friends and family by falling for a British soldier in the tense atmosphere of 1970s Belfast. Romantic drama, starring Jenny Agutter, John Ronane, Anthony Andrews and Danny Figgis.

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.

programme.title: The Murder of Mary Phagan
programme.desc: Part two of two. A Jewish factory owner in 1930s Georgia is unjustly accused of murder. Despite all the evidence pointing in another direction, an ambitious prosecutor and an unscrupulous journalist whip up a frenzy of anti-semitism against the suspect. However, the state governor sees through the bigotry and does everything in his power to see justice is done. Fact-based drama, starring Jack Lemmon, Peter Gallagher, Kevin Spacey and Richard Jordan.

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town after 10 years away to attend a wedding, and ends up magically reliving the day over and over again. The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack.

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A couple in a small New England town during the Second World War await the return of their two sons and daughter for Christmas. Drama, starring Hal Holbrook, Eva Marie Saint, Jason Oliver, Courteney Cox, Peter Gallagher and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.

programme.title: Till Death Us Do Part
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller about a Los Angeles district attorney who becomes increasingly obsessed with proving a cop is actually devious and dangerous con-man responsible for a string of murders, and vows to do whatever it takes to expose the truth. Treat Williams is on chilling form in the lead, while Arliss Howard, Rebecca Jenkins and Embeth Davidtz offer decent support.

programme.title: Silence of the Heart
programme.desc: A teenage suicide shatters a seemingly typical American family, turning their lives upside-down as they struggle to cope with their grief. Drama, starring Charlie Sheen, Mariette Hartley, Dana Hill, Howard Hesseman and Chad Lowe.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A film crew shoot a documentary at the plant, and the director tells Erin he can make her a star.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia make a decision about publishing a manuscript John-Boy wrote while overseas. Meanwhile, Jeffrey becomes very attached to an old dog.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by the destruction left in the wake of a tornado, a weary Charles Ingalls convinces himself to give up making a life for his family on an unforgiving prairie.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caleb Hodgekiss comes up with a way to scam the residents of Walnut Grove after rescuing a seriously ill Rev Alden from his runaway wagon. Johnny Cash guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Butterbox Babies
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a couple who founded a maternity home in Nova Scotia during the Depression, only for a determined health inspector to expose their good intentions as a front for such crimes as illegal adoption and medical malpractice. Starring Susan Clark, Peter MacNeill and Michael Riley.(n)

programme.title: King of the World
programme.desc: The early career of boxer Muhammad Ali, then known as Cassius Clay, as he prepares for a title fight against Sonny Liston, while struggling to come to terms with his private and public personas. Biopic, starring Terrence Howard, Steve Harris, Gary Dourdan and John Ventimiglia.(n)

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girl Murders
programme.desc: A detective is sent to investigate when the stars of a new raunchy calendar are murdered one at a time. He faces a race against time to find the killer before more blood is shed. Thriller, starring Tom Skerritt and Sharon Stone.(n)

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A road closure leaves eight strangers dealing with personal issues in their lives stranded together in an abandoned church during a snowstorm. They gradually learn to put their differences aside and find ways to help each other with the problems troubling them. Drama, starring Allison Hossack and Aaron Pearl.(n)

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem.(n)

programme.title: Other Women's Children
programme.desc: A doctor's relationship with a terminally ill child adds pressure to her already rocky marriage as she spends more time with her patient and gradually neglects her home life. Fact-based drama, starring Melanie Mayron, Eric Pospisil and Geraint Wyn Davies.(n)

programme.title: Will There Really be a Morning
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the life and career of Frances Farmer, exploring the troubled actress's battle with drugs and mental problems, her stormy relationships, and her death from cancer. Starring Susan Blakely, Lee Grant, Royal Dano, Joe Lambie and John Heard.(n)

programme.title: Spinning Boris
programme.desc: A mysterious gathering of Russian businessmen hires three American spin doctors for a secret mission - to ensure Boris Yeltsin retains the presidency in the 1996 election. This proves no easy task in the face of the incumbent's unpopularity with the public. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Jeff Goldblum, Anthony LaPaglia, Liev Schreiber and Svetlana Efremova.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of an illiterate basketball player whose career has been cut short by ill health, and helps him learn to read so he can secure a future outside the sport.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan tries to reunite a dying woman with her disapproving father, who has never forgiven her for having a child out of wedlock.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newly escorts a prisoner to jail, but finds his captive is being stalked by bounty hunters after the reward money.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A teacher believes that all children should get an education, but finds the parents of Dodge City do no agree. Guest starring John Vernon (National Lampoon's Animal House).

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The angels are assigned to help a high-flying TV reporter racked with guilt over her involvement in a tragic hit-and-run incident. Starring Roma Downey, Della Reese and Diahann Carroll.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The angels get involved in a family twist. Sam spontaneously proposes to Megan, his childhood sweetheart, but his mother refuses to give her blessing when she finds out Megan is HIV positive.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The arrival of a sophisticated family from New York has unenviable consequences for the Waltons.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy disobeys his mother and enters a week-long dance marathon with a pretty girl from a neighbouring town.

programme.title: Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: A shy college boy goes to work as a swimming instructor at an exclusive country club during the summer holidays - only to become besotted with the wealthy mother of one of his pupils. Drama, starring Susan Lucci and Patrick Von Horn.

programme.title: Murder So Sweet
programme.desc: A woman becomes convinced her smooth-talking ex-husband is responsible for the death of his latest wife, and persuades a detective to help prove her hunch. Mystery thriller, starring Harry Hamlin, Helen Shaver, KT Oslin and Terence Knox.

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: A rookie cop is assigned the tough case of tracking down a killer wreaking havoc among the residents of a housing development - and all the clues point to one of his friends. Thriller, starring Joe Don Baker, Hart Bochner and Chelsea Field.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin is attracted to a troubled artist, who asks to paint her picture. Grandma buys a canary, but finds it refuses to sing.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Willie Oleson's parents are shocked when their son announces he is planning to get married.

programme.title: Judgment Day: The John List Story
programme.desc: An apparently respectable, mild-mannered accountant who was abused as a child finally snaps under the pressure of his pent-up emotion. Tormented by the past, the once devoted family man cold-heartedly slaughters his wife and children - before embarking on a lengthy race to escape the FBI. Fact-based drama, starring Robert Blake, Beverly D'Angelo, David Caruso and Melinda Dillon.

programme.title: Sleeping with the Devil
programme.desc: A woman's life is turned upside down by the discovery that her seemingly perfect boyfriend is psychotically unbalanced and, as his mania increases, he pays a killer to gun her down. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Tim Matheson, Bonnie Bartlett and Steve Eastin.

programme.title: Out of the Ashes
programme.desc: A Holocaust survivor heads for America where she dreams of starting a new life, but finds it difficult to put the past behind her - especially when she's forced to relive the nightmare of Auschwitz. Drama, starring Christine Lahti, Richard Crenna and Beau Bridges.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a paralysed man who has fallen in love, but fears his condition will ruin the relationship. Mark is reluctant to get involved, as the woman in question is his cousin.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A greedy tycoon meets a kindly homeless man who is his exact double, and they decide to switch places to see how the other half lives. Guest starring Ned Beatty in a dual role.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt finds an orphan lost on the prairie, and takes her to live with her only relative - an aunt who does not want her.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Jed Hockett prepares for the wedding of his sons to the women they kidnapped - but the boys struggle with married life. Guest starring Harry Morgan (MASH) and William Katt (Carrie).(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica and Tess find themselves caught up in the middle of a bank robbery. Family drama, starring Roma Downey and Della Reese.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: After Monica reveals herself as an angel, the congregation falls victim to a crooked preacher who claims to be under God's direction. She also confronts a journalist who has witnessed a shooting. Roma Downey stars.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's book is accepted for publishing, ensuring his feelings of inadequacy are completely erased, and upstaging his brother Jason in the process.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's new part-time job hurtles him into the throes of an emotional battle raging in the heart of a hostile young blind woman.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Palomino
programme.desc: A photographer, struggling to overcome the break-up of her marriage by going to live on a friend's California ranch, where her riding skills impress the ranch hands - one of whom she embarks on a passionate affair with. However, her life takes a turn for the worse when her new lover is unable to cope with the class difference between them and an accident leaves her paralysed. Drama, starring Lee Horsley, Lindsay Frost, Eva Marie Saint and Rod Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob offers to teach Elizabeth to drive, but she has little talent for it. Corabeth's secret drinking is getting out of hand, and threatens her career.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Isaiah makes a promise to a dying man that he will find a home for his little girl, only to realise the infant is a baby orang-utan which wreaks havoc in Walnut Grove. Meanwhile, Willie is finally ready to graduate and propose to his girlfriend, but struggles to find the courage to tell his parents that he does not want to attend college.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Daddy
programme.desc: An advertising executive's wife walks out, leaving him to raise their children alone - a problem compounded by his mother's death in a car accident. Drama, starring Patrick Duffy, Lynda Carter, Kate Mulgrew and featuring an early appearance by Ben Affleck.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Vanished
programme.desc: A devoted mother's son is kidnapped, and as the FBI search widens, she is distressed to find herself suspected of involvement in the crime, along with a former lover who may not be what he seems. Drama set in the 1930s, starring Lisa Rinna, George Hamilton and Robert Hays.(n)

programme.title: Don't Die My Love
programme.desc: A high-school student bravely stands by her football star boyfriend as he undergoes painful treatment for cancer, but her mother's disapproval threatens to end their relationship. Drama, starring Beth Broderick, Scott Vickaryous, Katie Herrod and Malcolm Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Shadow of a Doubt
programme.desc: A washed-up alcoholic former lawyer is persuaded to return to the courtroom by an ex-lover, whose daughter is charged with murder. He agrees to take on the case, but finds himself at the centre of the media circus as the prosecution uses his drink problem to undermine his credibility. Courtroom drama, starring Brian Dennehy, Bonnie Bedelia and Fairuza Balk.(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Norman Saves the World
programme.desc: Searching for a way to get Mickey out of prison, Ray turns to an old opponent to secure a bartering chip in the form of a less-than-wholesome family comedy star. A long-buried scandal leads Ray to an unexpected confrontation with a slick Hollywood agent and a former fixer of Ezra's. Meanwhile, without the protection of the Russians, Ray must help Mickey secure his own safety and gain admittance to the secure K6G prison wing(c)

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage(c)

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: Compared to What? The Improbable Journey of Barney Frank
programme.desc: Documentary that goes inside the public private life of one of America's most outspoken politicians, Barney Frank. Combining forty years of rare and archival material with interviews, this intimate portrait follows Frank from the Halls of Congress to the streets of Boston and to the taking of his wedding vows, as he becomes the first Member of Congress to enter into a same sex marriage

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?

programme.title: Norman Saves the World
programme.desc: Searching for a way to get Mickey out of prison, Ray turns to an old opponent to secure a bartering chip in the form of a less-than-wholesome family comedy star. A long-buried scandal leads Ray to an unexpected confrontation with a slick Hollywood agent and a former fixer of Ezra's. Meanwhile, without the protection of the Russians, Ray must help Mickey secure his own safety and gain admittance to the secure K6G prison wing(n)

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims(n)

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar(n)

programme.title: Dead Man
programme.desc: Jim Jarmusch's take on the Western genre is a deadpan, drop-dead-gorgeous tour through an offbeat Wild West following William Blake (Johnny Depp), an accountant from Ohio who is confused with the English poet by a Native American named Nobody (Gary Farmer). They link destinies as they try to stay one step ahead of the hired guns on their trail. Robby Muller's cinematography won critics awards and the film garnered Independent Spirit Award nominations for Best Film, Best Screenplay and Best Supporting Actor (Farmer)(n)

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Bubble Boy
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this offbeat comedy as a teenager with an immune system deficiency, who has spent his entire life living in a plastic bubble under the doting, overprotective care of his mother. When he learns that the girl next door he secretly loves is going to be married, he assembles a "bubble suit" and sets out on a cross-country odyssey to woo her(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chloë Grace Moretz(n)

programme.title: Alfie (2004)

Marisa Tomei, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon, Omar Epps and Nia Long costar in this remake of the 1966 classic(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola(n)

programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: Norman Saves the World

programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: The eighth installment in the popular, long-running horror film series finds masked supernatural killer Michael Myers back to haunt his now-institutionalized sister (Jamie Lee Curtis) as well as the six teenagers spending the night in his family home as a reality-show Internet stunt. Busta Rhymes, Tyra Banks, Ryan Merriman, Thomas Ian Nicholas and Sean Patrick Thomas costar in this freaky follow-up from "Halloween 2" director Rick Rosenthal

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: In this cult horror classic, five friends pick up a traumatized young hitchhiker, and find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chain saw-wielding killer and his family of psychopaths

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner in a futuristic dystopia where the polar ice caps have melted and the earth is almost entirely submerged, forcing him to battle starvation and outlaws while reluctantly helping a woman and a child try to find dry land

programme.desc: A young couple find themselves face-to-face against a terrifying evil when they venture into the remote woods of Bigfoot country to research the existence of the infamous ape

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: American newlyweds honeymooning in China discover a legendary ancient custom that comes back to haunt them in a remote village

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Set in a pulp comic styled glamorous 1930s, a down-on-his-luck pilot stumbles upon an incredible invention -- a top-secret jetpack -- but before long, a sinister spy interferes and the pilot must embark on a thrilling and dangerous mission. Stars Timothy Dalton and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard

Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth(n)

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: After the death of his sister, a man returns home with his fiancée and his recently orphaned nephew to take care of his father, and discovers that a truly evil force is lurking outside the house and won't stop until it kills every last member of his family(n)

Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda(n)

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Mockumentary horror set in a 1960s paranormal research institute, where a new female subject displays demonic prowess. But when the US government steps in to weaponize her abilities, there are disastrous consequences(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.desc: Marty deals with his newest clients, hip-hop clothing moguls Dre Collins and Lukas Frye, who have divergent attitudes and plans for their company, DollaHyde. Jeannie defines the role she'll play in her new position. Clyde goes through some personal hard times and turns to Marty for help(c)

programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. Is each the figment of the other's imagination, or is something more powerful and wonderfully supernatural going on? William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears

programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Unnatural

Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Griffin O'Neal and Randy Quaid costar in this cult classic, a late-night television favorite(n)

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler(n)

programme.title: Soldiers
programme.desc: Marty and Jeannie launch a duplicitous plan to remove Lukas from DollaHyde. Dre and Marty continue to bond on a personal level. Clyde woos Marissa, a big client, to bring to Kaan & Associates; and Doug deals with his feelings about having a baby with Sarah(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees(n)

programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist(n)

programme.desc: Documentary that takes a behind the scenes tour of groundbreaking director Richard Linklater's last 21 years creating his iconic legacy of films from the unconventional breakout 'Slacker' to the innovative 'Boyhood'. Features candid conversations with actors Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Matthew McConaughey and others(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack(n)

programme.title: Pride

Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama(n)

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist(n)

Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.desc: Touching and funny documentary following comedian Pauly Shore on tour as he plays venues in small towns across the mid-west, entertaining his loyal fans. Between hilarious standup clips, Shore deals with his ailing mother and reflects on his life outside of comedy, giving a rare glimpse into the man behind the persona

programme.desc: A young couple live in a broken-down car parked alongside Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, spending their days in a ritual of scamming, thieving and scoring heroine to feed their addiction until they must confront the difficult truth about their relationship
A free-for-all, no-rules round-table with panelists Robert Klein, Jonathan Winters and Rick Overton(c)

programme.title: Shopgirl
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Steve Martin, Claire Danes and Jason Schwartzman about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man. Based on the novel by Steve Martin

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: A madcap dramatic comedy about a self-induced attention-deficit disordered, learning disabled, Tourette's syndrome suffering, balance impaired, ex-alcoholic young man from the Upper East Side of Manhattan and the woman who inspires him to try to get it together

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam

programme.title: Shopgirl
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Steve Martin, Claire Danes and Jason Schwartzman about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man. Based on the novel by Steve Martin

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. programme.title: Chappie

Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. When Scotland Yard criminal psychologist Dr. Michael Glass (David Morrissey) is assigned to profile Tramell, however, he finds himself drawn irresistibly into her web of seduction and lies. David Thewlis also stars in this sizzling thriller from director Michael Caton-Jones ("This Boy's Life," "Rob Roy")

But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)
