programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters

programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama

programme.title: First Kid
programme.desc: Comedy about a wisecracking Secret Service agent who is unwillingly assigned to protect the president's rebellious 14-year-old son. The pair take an instant dislike to each other but they may have more in common then they think

programme.desc: Documentary following eight actresses as they detail their experiences in Hollywood and wrestle with plastic surgery, race, sexism, nudity, recognition, double standards, age and family(n)

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: Romantic Improvisations. It has been five months since the wedding of Paul and Jamie Buchman (Paul Reiser, Helen Hunt) -- and five whole days since Paul and Jamie have been alone long enough to do what married couples do in privacy. Their plans to spend an evening by themselves lead to a hilarious misunderstanding when each assumes the other has canceled a dinner engagement. This premiere episode of Mad About You serves to introduce not only the Buchmans, but also their friends Mark and Fran Devanow (Richard Kind, Leila Kenzle), Lisa Stemple (Anne Ramsay), and Jay Selby (Tommy Hinkley) -- not to mention Murray the dog(n)

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: Sofa's Choice. It's high time for the newly married Buchmans to make their first major purchase together, which is why Jamie (Helen Hunt) insists that Paul (Paul Reiser) go along with her when she picks out a couch. Confused by the myriad of choices (tea-dipped Irish linen or antique?), and by the very thought of having to actually make a choice, Paul practically goes into shock. And besides, a couch is a couch, even if someone else calls it a divan...or a sofa...or...(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: Eccentric Captain Sparrow is on a mission to rescue Governor Swann's beautiful daughter, Elizabeth, and his ship, the Black Pearl, both of which have been captured by the curse-ridden pirate Captain Barbossa. They brave the deadly seas and head towards the mysterious Isla de Muerta in an attempt to stop the skeletal pirates from spilling Elizabeth's blood to lift the curse that keeps them in limbo(n)

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart and Charlize Theron star in Rupert Sanders' directorial debut, a dark reworking of the classic fairy tale. The beautiful Queen Ravenna is an evil sorceress who seized the throne by killing the widowed King Magnus on their wedding night. Ravenna's astonishing looks are maintained solely at a terrible cost to the realm's maidens; and when she discovers the beating heart of her long-imprisoned stepdaughter Snow White will grant her eternal pulchritude, the princess's days are numbered. But Snow White is now a strong, capable young woman, and she flees to the near-impenetrable Dark Forest, where Ravenna's black arts are impotent. So the queen dispatches The Huntsman to bring Snow White to her fate. However, he switches allegiance and joins forces with Snow White, Prince William and eight dwarves to set out to end Ravenna's cruel reign. But there will be bloody battles and much potent magic to overcome before that is possible..(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman won a much-deserved Best Actor Oscar for his uncannily astounding performance as "In Cold Blood" author Truman Capote. The exceptional biopic spans the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece. Catherine Keener received a Best Supporting Oscar nod as Capote's friend and researcher Harper Lee, who a few years later would publish "To Kill a Mockingbird." Dan Futterman's script was also Oscar-nominated. Clifton Collins Jr., Chris Cooper, Bob Balaban, Amy Ryan

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Will Smith and director Barry Sonnenfeld last struck gold with the international blockbuster Men In Black and they re-team for this rollicking action adventure movie that puts a brand new spin on the Western. Smith plays government agent Jim West, who finds himself paired with fellow agent Artemus Gordon when Dr Arliss Loveless plots to assassinate the President. Both West and Gordon have their unique talents - Jim is a witty charmer who can talk his way out of any situation, while Artemus is a master of disguise with a dazzling talent for inventing things - and they'll need every trick in the book if they're to outwit their new nemesis. Look out for some spectacular special effects, including a giant transportation device known as The Tarantula, as well as Salma Hayek, who co-stars as the sassy love interest

Join Charlie Brown, Lucy, Linus and friends on a new epic adventure while Snoopy tracks down his nemesis, the Red Baron. Charles M. Schulz's iconic characters are brought to life in state of the art 3D animation from Blue Sky Studios, the creators of the Ice Age films. Directed by Steve Martino. programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: A man trying to run away from trouble finds it follows him in unexpected ways in this action-packed vehicle for comic actors Eddie Griffin and Orlando Jones. Daryl Chase (Jones) is a successful investment banker who handles international accounts for a major New York firm. Chase discovers to his surprise that one of his biggest clients, a company from Mexico, is actually a front for a cartel of drug smugglers; Chase realizes too late that he's been framed for money laundering, and is now wanted by the FBI. Chase is soon approached by a CIA agent, who thinks Chase's relationship with the Mexican drug kingpins might prove useful, but when his local contact disappears, Chase has to make his way to Mexico in order to save his skin and hopefully clear his name. Needing a new identity to get out of town and across the border, Chase obtains a stolen passport -- and soon learns the man whose name he's using is in even deeper trouble with the law than himself. With nowhere else to turn, Chase asks streetwise hustler Freddie Tiffany (Griffin) to help him get out of town; Chase will pretend to be Freddie, while Tiffany will pose as a businessman like Chase. However, Chase finds out Tiffany isn't the man he thought he was, and that his sticky situation is even more perilous and fraught with secrets than he imagined. Double Take was inspired by the 1957 drama Across The Bridge, which was in turn based on a novel by Graham Greene; the supporting cast includes Edward Herrmann, Gary Grubbs, Garcelle Beauvais, and Daniel Roebuck(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Stephen Herek's romantic comedy stars Angelina Jolie as Lanie Kerrigan, a New York-based television news reporter who anchors the morning show and is engaged to baseball star Cal Cooper, with whom she shares her flash lifestyle. Leaving aside her sparky working relationship with cameraman Pete, it all looks close to perfect to the outsider. But things take an abrupt about turn when she's sent to interview Prophet Jack, a sidewalk savant feted for his ability to predict football scores. He dutifully predicts the next day's results for her, as well as unseasonal weather, along with the unwelcome, unsettling news that she will die in a week's time. So far, so dismissible - until the scores come in, together with an unexpected hail storm, leaving Lanie with some serious thinking to do about what she wants from (her apparently foreshortened) life and her relationships..(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Robin Williams toned down his usually manic comic approach in this successful period drama. In 1959, the Welton Academy is a staid but well-respected prep school where education is a pragmatic and rather dull affair. Several of the students, however, have their thoughts on the learning process (and life itself) changed when a new teacher comes to the school. John Keating (Williams) is an unconventional educator who tears chapters of his textbooks and asks his students to stand on their desks to see the world from a new angle. Keating introduces his students to poetry, and his free-thinking attitude and the liberating philosophies of the authors he introduces to his class have a profound effect on his students, especially Todd (Ethan Hawke), who would like to be a writer; Neil ( Robert Sean Leonard), who dreams of being an actor, despite the objections of his father; Knox (Josh Charles), a hopeless romantic; Steven (Allelon Ruggiero), an intellectual who learns to use his heart as well as his head; Charlie (Gale Hansen), who begins to lose his blasé attitude; unconventional Gerard (James Waterston); and practical Richard (Dylan Kussman). Keating urges his students to seize the day and live their lives boldly; but when this philosophy leads to an unexpected tragedy, headmaster Mr. Nolan (Norman Lloyd) fires Keating, and his students leap to his defense. Dead Poets Society was nominated for four Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Actor for Williams; it won one, for Tom Schulman's original screenplay

programme.desc: A pair of criminals kidnap the 9-month old baby of a wealthy couple, hoping to claim a large ransom. The baby escapes, however, and soon begins crawling his way through Chicago. Now the kidnappers, the parents, and the police are all out to find the infant in this slapstick comedy(n)

programme.title: Grilled
programme.desc: Two meat salesmen find themselves embroiled in trouble when they get caught up in the middle of a mob war in this engaging crime comedy(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: A misfit teenager forms an unlikely friendship with a female classmate who has leukemia. As they grow closer, she helps him with his creative endeavours and forces him to confront the messiness of real life(n)

programme.title: Forget Paris
programme.desc: Charming romantic comedy with Billy Crystal falling in love with Paris based airline executive Debra Winger and must decide between Paris and L.A(n)

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Gina Norris is a long way from the Barbershop - she's moved from Chicago to Atlanta so her daughter can attend a prestigious music school, and she's made a name for herself at a posh salon with her cutting-edge hairstyles. But when her egotistical boss takes credit for her work, she leaves the salon with the shampoo girl in tow to open a shop of her own. Gina buys a rundown salon and inherits a motley group of headstrong stylists, a colorful clientele, and a sexy piano-playing electrician. It's a rocky road to fulfilling her dreams, but you can't keep a good woman down(n)

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Margaret Cho. Margaret Cho makes observations on dieting, racism and her sitcom "All American Girl." Taped at the Variety Arts Theater in Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Juno may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker, the pregnant teen quickly realises how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah, who's always willing to help out in a pinch(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition - one that has never had an American winner. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best!(n)

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Boxing comedy drama about two ageing fighters who never made the big time but remain good friends. When an undercard bout in Las Vegas is cancelled at short notice, they are asked to step in. Unfortunately, they have to fight each other(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: WikiLeaks' Julian Assange and comedian Jeff Ross are the interview guests. The panelists are filmmaker Rob Reiner, former senator Rick Santorum and political commentator Tara Setmayer(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Journalism; and the Opening Ceremony of the 2016 Olympics in Rio are discussed(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin inherited his Chicago barbershop from his dad, but now he's sold it to loanshark Lester. Hearing that the crook plans to turn it into a nightclub, Calvin resolves to get his salon back. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Max

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey

programme.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
programme.desc: A live-action, Mandarin-language adaptation of the popular 1958 children's book by author Zhang Tianyi, The Secret of the Magic Gourd follows the wondrous adventures of a young schoolboy named Wang Bao. When Wang Bao discovers a magical gourd that can instantly grant his every wish, the awkward child suddenly becomes a hero amongst his curious classmates. When the gourd proves more of a burden than a blessing and the boy decides to get rid of it, he quickly discovers that's easier said than done

With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has magical powers

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house

programme.title: Racing Stripes
programme.desc: Kids of all ages will jockey for position in front of the TV for this heartwarming and funny family comedy about an abandoned zebra (voice of Frankie Muniz) that yearns to be a Thoroughbred after it is adopted by a Kentucky farm girl (Hayden Panettiere). Conroy and the wolf, which he names White Fang, have a number of adventures and make a few enemies on their way to finding the gold mine(n)

programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita and computer-game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their Dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs' puppies are kidnapped by Anita's boss Cruella De Vil, who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the coat she has set her heart on(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: It is the year 1957 and Hogarth Hughes, a little boy who lives in the small town of Rockwell, discovers a man made out of iron, who comes from outer space and lost his memory, and saves him of dying by electrocution. Because of living in the middle of the Cold War, the boy thinks that the best option for this iron man is to stay in the junkyard of one of his friends and hide there until they get to a solution but an egocentric general of the military forces finds out what happened and begins to search for the giant in order to destroy him. Meanwhile, even though the boy thought he was going to find more help, the people of the town begin to feel terrified and want the problem to be solved no matter what(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company (?)
programme.desc: The Potato Custom.(n)

programme.title: One Last Hug (...and a few smooches) Three Days at Grief Camp (?)
Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Hopelessly stranded on the remote shores of Madagascar, the New Yorkers hatch a plan to get back to Central Park that instead finds them soaking up sun in the picturesque plains of Africa. Madagascar may be a nice place to visit, but for the gang of animals who spent most of their lives in New York, there is truly no place like home. After discovering the remnants of a crashed airplane, the penguins quickly set about making the repairs needed to get the craft airborne again. When the plane finally takes to the sky, it begins to look like it's only a matter of time before Alex the Lion (voice of Ben Stiller) and friends are soaring over New York Harbor. Unfortunately the penguins weren't the aviation experts they claimed to be, and before long the crew is coming in for a crash-landing in the untamed plains of Africa. Now, as the animals reared in the safety of the zoo come into contact with their decidedly wild counterparts for the very first time, they get a better feel for their roots while marveling over the differences between life in the concrete jungle and life on the world's second largest continent. Of course, while there's plenty to love about wandering the open plains, romantic rivalries and the risk of running into dangerous poachers soon begin to outweigh the joys of some long-overdue family reunions. With some particularly heavy cases of homesickness causing hearts to weigh heavy, the group gradually starts to wonder whether they'll ever find their way back home. Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith, Sacha Baron Cohen, Cedric the Entertainer, and Andy Richter lend their voices to this animated sequel that re-teams original Madagascar co-directors Eric Darnell and Tom McGrath(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita and computer-game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their Dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs' puppies are kidnapped by Anita's boss Cruella De Vil, who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the coat she has set her heart on(n)

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: A military dog named Max is adopted by his late handler's grieving family, and forms a close bond with the soldier's younger brother Justin. With the help of his canine friend, Justin explores the mystery of how his sibling died(n)

programme.title: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: Fantasy drama about a successful but unfulfilled 40-year-old whose life is turned around when he magically meets a younger version of himself. Not only is he able to give the young lad advice about his own future, but it turns out that the youngster can also help his older self to be a better person(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen

programme.title: Phil Spector
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as legendary music producer Phil Spector in this compelling film exploring Spector's relationship with his attorney (Helen Mirren) during his first trial for murder

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Two Arkansas firemen learn from a dying man that he hid a stash of gold in a disused warehouse 50 years earlier in an East St Louis ghetto. When they go in search of the loot, the pair unwittingly observe a murder carried out by the local mob and become targets themselves, especially when it becomes known why they happen to be in the area in the first place

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Bret Gives Up the Dream. With much reluctance, Bret lands a day-job, but it soon leads to complications with the band

programme.title: The Perfect Weapon
programme.desc: A tough American street fighter stalks the streets of Chinatown in search of the organised criminals who killed his guardian. Action

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tom Sturridge, and Michael Sheen star in Thomas Vinterberg's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's beloved novel about an independent woman pursued by a trio of disparate suitors

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) races to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by members of the very organization he was hired into as director Paul Greengrass brings author Robert Ludlum's popular character back to the big screen for his third feature outing. David Strathairn, Julia Stiles, Joan Allen, and Paddy Considine co-star

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorized by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge

programme.title: Freeheld

Directed by Peter Sollett. Also stars Steve Carell, Michael Shannon, Josh Charles, Luke Grimes, Mary Birdsong and Gabriel Luna

programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of professional climbers successfully scale Mount Everest only to be faced with tragedy when a monster storm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Jason Clarke, and John Hawkes co-star. Directed by Baltasar Kormakur (2 Guns)

programme.title: The Transporter

programme.title: Dirty Driving: Thundercars of Indiana
programme.desc: Documentarian Jon Alpert visits Anderson, Ind., where residents who are still reeling from the closing of a once-thriving General Motors factory seek distraction from a struggling economy in auto racing at the local speedway on Friday nights(n)

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: Seminal film which conferred star-status on to actors Robert DE Niro, Harvey Keitel and director Martin Scorsese. Keitel is Charlie, a young man torn between his love of the Church, and his friend who is linked to the mob(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Aliens attack, but with air force ace Will Smith and President Bill Pullman, who'd bet against the US of A?(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: One man bears witness to the secret history of America during the Cold War in this drama directed by celebrated actor Robert De Niro. In 1939, Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) is a young man with a bright future ahead of him -- he's a top student at Yale and the protégé of one of the school's leading English professors, Dr. Fredericks (Michael Gambon). But Wilson's life changes dramatically when he's invited to join Yale's powerful secret society, Skull and Bones. Through his Skull and Bones connections, Wilson meets Sam Murach (Alec Baldwin), an mysterious FBI agent who asks Wilson to investigate charges that Fredericks is a Nazi sympathizer working with the German government. Later, at a Skull and Bones party, Wilson is introduced to Clover Russell (Angelina Jolie), the sister of one of his classmates and the daughter of a powerful politician; their one-night stand leaves Clover pregnant, and Wilson must leave the woman he loves, Laura (Tammy Blanchard), to wed Clover and give their child a name. Shortly after their wedding, thanks to his work with Murach, Wilson is invited to join the Office of Strategic Services, a military intelligence organization organized by Bill Sullivan (Robert De Niro), and Wilson accepts. Through World War II, Wilson serves with the OSS, and learns he can trust no one in the game of international espionage, which helps make him little more than a stranger to his wife, his son, and his few friends. As the OSS evolves into the Central Intelligence Agency after the war, Wilson becomes party to America's darkest and most dangerous secrets, and in the wake of the futile Bay of Pigs invasion in 1961, Wilson is forced to make a terrible choice between the security of his nation and the safety of his family. Inspired by the true-life story of CIA founder James J. Angleton, The Good Shepherd boasts an impressive supporting cast, including William Hurt, John Turturro, Billy Crudup, Joe Pesci, and Timothy Hutton(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Run for the Money. A homecoming football game may be just the thing for Gamby and Russell to bring about Dr. Brown's downfall(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: Romantic comedy based on Nick Hornby's popular novel about a thirty something record shop owner struggling to reconcile his enthusiasm for music with his adult responsibilities. The shop is unprofitable, not least because of the two morose assistants with an aggressive customer-service manner. Add to this the misery of a string of failed relationships, and the scene is set for an obsessive review of the protagonist's past(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Aliens attack, but with air force ace Will Smith and President Bill Pullman, who'd bet against the US of A?(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson adapts Thomas Pynchon's celebrated detective novel in this Annapurna Pictures production. Joaquin Phoenix stars as Larry "Doc" Sportello, a pot-smoking private eye at the tail end of the psychedelic '60s who investigates a kidnapping case involving his old flame Shasta Fay Hepworth (Katherine Waterston) and her missing sugar daddy Mickey Wolfmann (Eric Roberts), a powerful real-estate mogul. In the course of his investigation Doc butts heads with Lt. Det. Christian F. "Bigfoot" Bjornsen (Josh Brolin), a part-time actor with a palpable distain for the free-love generation, and a reputation for committing civil-rights violations. Later, as clues to Wolfmann's disappearance begin to suggest a conspiracy involving the FBI and a mysterious underworld syndicate known as the Golden Fang, Doc seeks the help of his lawyer Sauncho Smilax, Esq. (Benicio Del Toro) and Deputy D.A. Penny Kimball (Reese Witherspoon). Meanwhile, Doc also agrees to search for Coy Harlingen (Owen Wilson), a reportedly deceased saxophone player who may not be as dead as rumors suggest, and who seems somehow tied to the ongoing Wolfmann investigation. Martin Short, Jena Malone, and Joanna Newsom co-star

programme.title: Top Ten Monks
programme.desc: A profile of the Cistercian monks at the Stift Heiligenkreuz Abbey, a 12th-century monastery near Vienna, who became a worldwide musical sensation after releasing a chart-topping album of Gregorian chants in 2008

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue

programme.title: The Girl
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock was at the height of his fame and creativity when, in 1962, he chose an unknown fashion model to star in his most ambitious film, The Birds. But as he sculpted Tippi Hedren into the perfect Hitchcock blonde of his imagination, he became obsessed with the impossible dream of winning the real woman's love. His failure destroyed both of their careers. Screenwriter Gwyneth Hughes has interviewed Tippi Hedren and surviving members of Hitchcock's crew. This film tells their full tragic story

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Two terminally ill old guys, a tycoon and a mechanic, embark on a things-to-do-before-I-die road trip

programme.title: El amor me queda grande
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy is in love with a girl two years older who won't let anything stop her from becoming a wealthy writer and critic

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Troubled Nobel Prize-winning mathematician John Nash is the subject of this compelling Oscar-winning drama. The movie won a total of four Academy Awards

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Two terminally ill old guys, a tycoon and a mechanic, embark on a things-to-do-before-I-die road trip

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying(n)

programme.title: Naked Lunch
programme.desc: David Cronenberg's bizarre and disturbing drama is based on William Burroughs' equally strange novel, with some outrageous sequences involving William Lee, an ex-drug addict who now makes a living from exterminating cockroaches. Suddenly, without warning, he is sucked into a seedy underworld inhabited by drug-taking spies, talking typewriter insects and sexually threatening Mugwumps, strange creatures from a place called Interzone(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Martian'
programme.desc: A look at "The Martian," a 2015 adaptation of Andy Weir's novel about a lone astronaut who is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry. The film stars Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain and Jeff Daniels, and is directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Though chef Kate Armstrong's Type A personality serves her well when whipping up meals in the trendy Manhattan eatery where she has made a name for herself, it threatens to sink her when she is named as the guardian of her nine-year-old niece Zoe. To complicate matters, an impetuous new sous chef named Nick Palmer has recently joined the kitchen staff and his freewheeling personality seems to stand in direct opposition to Kate's unwavering perfectionism. Irish Televsion Premiere (S)(n)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Actor-turned-director and producer Griffin Dunne (Practical Magic, Addicted to Love) teams up with scenarist Dirk Wittenborn for the slice-of-life ensemble drama Fierce People. As summer encroaches, 16-year-old Manhattanite Finn Earl (Anton Yelchin) would love nothing more than to trek off to South America and spend the year's sun-drenched months near the equator, embarking on thrilling adventures with his estranged archaeologist father, whom he's never met. Alas, the bonds of family rein in tight when Finn's booze- and coke-addled mother, the masseuse Liz (Diane Lane), cries out for help -- and, in the process, unwittingly gets Finn arrested. In a dramatic attempt to reverse circumstances and sort out the complications in both of their lives, Liz insists on taking custody of Finn for the summer. Both, she insists, will live in the home of one of her former massage clients, the aging billionaire Ogden C. Osborne (Donald Sutherland) -- with whom she may be amorously involved. Though Finn agrees begrudgingly at first, in time he finds the environment welcoming -- as he develops a crush on Ogden's gorgeous granddaughter (Kristen Stewart) and befriends Ogden's grandson. But when an unforeseen and shocking act of violence erupts, it estranges Finn and Liz from their posh surroundings and provides a sobering, harrowing reminder of the socioeconomic differences between the Earls and their new friends(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biography of Howard Hughes, centering on his glory years from the 1920s to the 1940s. After making a fortune improving the design of oil drilling bits, Hughes becomes the Hollywood mogul behind RKO studios, and devotes his lief to aviation. The film also depicts Hughes' romances Hollywood starlets Jean Harlow and Katharine Hepburn(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Produced by Tom Hanks, written by Aaron Sorkin, and directed by Mike Nichols, this adaptation of George Crile III's incendiary bestseller tells the remarkable story of the Texas congressman whose efforts to prevent the Red Army from overtaking Afghanistan eventually led to the collapse of the Soviet Union while simultaneously fueling the rise of radical Islam. In the early 1980s, a hastily assembled army of Afghan "freedom fighters" achieved the remarkable feat of fending off Soviet invaders despite the fact that the odds were overwhelmingly stacked against them. At the time, Texas congressman Charlie Wilson (Hanks) was a key member of the hugely powerful House Appropriations Committee. Illuminated to the specifics of this remarkable war by a high-profile Houston socialite, Wilson spearheaded an effort to provide hundreds of millions of dollars in weapons and training to the Mujahideen with more than a little help from brilliant but prickly CIA operative Gust Avrokotos(n)

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Director Ridley Scott spins this yarn concerning a Harlem drug kingpin (Denzel Washington) who smuggles heroin into the country by hiding it in the bodies of U.S. soldiers killed during battle in Vietnam. As honest NYPD detective Ritchie Roberts (Russell Crowe) investigates the case, his integrity is compromised by the meddling of the crooked Detective Trupo (Josh Brolin)(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production(n)

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's slick and fast-paced third film, based on an Elmore Leonard novel, a tight thriller centred around a strong woman, blaxploitation star Pam Grier, an air hostess towards the end of her career. She's been trafficking in 'hot' money for Samuel L Jackson but when she finds she's carrying enough for retirement, she decides to fly solo - so long as she can keep him, the local cops and the feds convinced of her honesty(n)

Así se embarca en la campaña mediática de Goni, el candidato neoliberal que busca alzarse con la presidencia de Bolivia. programme.title: Heaven Help Us

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Roberto Benigni's Oscar winner for Best Foreign Language Film plays like two movies: a slapstick comedy and a heartfelt drama. Benigni plays an Italian Jew whose family is taken to a concentration camp, where he concocts a game to protect his young son. Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: This feel-good ensemble comedy tracks a quartet of suburban siblings and their families over the course of a single summer. Hardworking Gil Buckman (Steve Martin) and his stay-at-home wife, Karen (Mary Steeenburgen), have just a few months to help their oldest son, Kevin (Jasen Fisher), overcome his high-strung behavior problems before he'll be relegated to special-education classes. Gil's difficult relationship with his own father, Frank (Jason Robards), has led him to become a would-be super-dad for his three kids, so he takes his son's difficulties more than a little personally. Gil's sister, Helen (Dianne Wiest), is trying to raise a moody, adolescent son (Leaf Phoenix) and an independent-minded daughter (Martha Plimpton) with no help from her well-off ex-husband, who's more interested in his new wife and family. Gil and Helen's sister, Susan (Harley Jane Kozak), meanwhile, must participate in the too-scripted Big Life Plans of her anal-retentive husband, Nathan (Rick Moranis), whose overachiever zeal infects even their toddler daughter. When long-lost brother Larry (Tom Hulce) show up with yet another get-rich-quick scheme, he brings with him a surprise addition to the family. Screenwriters Babaloo Mandel, Lowell Ganz, and Ron Howard negotiate their varied subplots with a deftness and comedic touch that transforms this conflicted clan into a suburban everyfamily

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. programme.title: Summer in Transylvania
programme.sub-title: The Summer That Time Forgot - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. First episode of the comedy about an ordinary teenage girl who goes to a new school in Transylvania - where she has vampires, zombies, werewolves and mummies for classmates. Starring Sophie Stuckey.

programme.title: Genie in the House
programme.desc: Emma is fed up with being told off by Mr Preston, so wishes she had his job. However, the school inspector does not take kindly to the new headmistress' approach to education.

programme.title: House of Anubis
programme.desc: Mick's father puts pressure on Victor to remove the security cameras and reinstate Trudy, while the next riddle leads the gang to explore under the stairs.

programme.title: House of Anubis
programme.desc: Jerome tells Mara about his seemingly impossible mission, only to find she might be able to help him succeed in his task.

programme.title: Life with Boys
programme.desc: Tess and her brothers make plans for Christmas, but Jack announces he wants them to help prepare a festive surprise for Grandma instead.

programme.title: Life with Boys
programme.desc: The family struggles to cope with sharing one bathroom, and the boys agree to do more around the house as their father takes a second job.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: Carly and Sam compete against Freddie and Spencer to see who can attract the most viewers to the show - but their friendly rivalry goes too far.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Cat's favourite actress dies, so she persuades Tori and Jade to join a vigil at the star's house. Trina directs and stars in a play.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: After Trip accidentally destroys a copy of the Game Shakers' latest game, the kids must sneak into Dub's studio to retrieve a copy of the game from his tablet.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe tries to lose her goody-goody reputation to impress Max's new best friend.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Everyone thinks Henry threw a girl off the roof on her last birthday. Captain Man tries to prove he is innocent in time for her party this year.

programme.title: Bella and the Bulldogs
programme.desc: Bella tries to help Newt find his place on the team after Coach shuts down his latest request to be a starter. Meanwhile, Troy takes an interest in an older girl.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: The girls babysit a pair of twins, and Sam takes the chance to play a trick on her friend. Cat seeks the aid of her own sister in responding with a prank of her own.

programme.desc: Sictom about a boy who gets hired to be superhero's kid sidekick. Starring Jace Norman.

programme.desc: Jas is overjoyed to hear the girls have won their campaign for a new school library - until she is told her favourite tree will have to be chopped down to make way for the building.

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: When Lily is upset to realise Matt is going out with cool girl Greta Masters, Jas plans a make-over slumber party to cheer her up. Unfortunately it clashes with a rare comet sighting, which Martha and Ollie are desperate to experience. They have even been allowed to borrow the very precious school telescope for the evening. Ollie is smuggled in to Lily's house by Martha to watch secretly from the attic, with Martha planning to split her time between both events. After much chaos and confusion, and with the presence of Ollie in the house rumbled, a compromise is finally reached, where the girls all get to do both the make-over and watch the rare comet. At the end of the make-over session Martha and Jas are horrified to see Lily has transformed herself to look exactly like Greta in a bid to impress Matt. To spare Lily's feelings they pretend to like her new look, but are relieved the next day in school to see Lily returned to her normal, natural self. Lily has realised it's better to be yourself, rather than try and change who you are just to please others.

programme.title: So Awkward
programme.desc: Martha is eagerly anticipating the visit of the Careers Guidance Counsellor, Mrs Lazarus. It's the perfect opportunity to help her finally decide upon a future career. When the mean-spirited Mrs Lazarus suggests Martha may not have what it takes to become a human rights lawyer and tells her to `aim lower', a defiant Martha sets about proving her wrong.

programme.title: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch
programme.desc: The Ramsay family gets into American football, with Jack, Megan and Holly going training with a professional team called the Inglewood Blackhawks. later, they enjoy some cheerleader training with the athletic LA Dream All Stars, and learn how Americans support their teams. Meanwhile, Matilda makes a dinner to celebrate the sport, kicking off with Sloppy Joes and Touch Down Dip and Chips, followed by cherry pie.

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Ella makes James and Riley see that their relationship might not be as strong as they thought. Thalia and Eldon find new ways of communicating in secret. Reality-style drama, following the lives of a group of dancers as they attempt to win the regional championships.

programme.title: Operation Ouch
programme.desc: Medics Chris and Xand test a new theory to see if they can find out why skin goes wrinkly in the bath. Dr Chris meets a patient taking part in ground-breaking heart research, and tests the power of your eyes in a mind-bending trick.

programme.title: Operation Ouch
programme.desc: The doctors reveal how kidneys work, while in A&E one patient has an unusual leg injury and another has a stone stuck in his ear.

By the time this last clash concludes, the show's first-ever winner will have been decided.
